item.title: Answered-Can you Daisy Chain VMware Update Manager Download Service?
item.description: I had a design/suggested infrastructure set up on a recent project which basically had UMDS on a server in a DMZ getting ESXi patches from the internet via a proxy. Then a server in a secondary DMZ outside one of the target environments running another UMDS instance. The idea was to open 80/443 from UMDS in one DMZ to the other. Adding the internet connected UMDS server as a url to the secondary UMDS server.
